{{{
<property name="gettexttasks.jar" value="${limewire.lib.jars.ant}/gettexttasks.jar"/>

<target name="init.gettext-merge" description="Loads the gettext-merge task">
  <taskdef name="gettext-merge" classname="org.xnap.commons.ant.gettext.GettextMergeKeysTask" classpath="${gettexttasks.jar}"/>
</target>
 	
<target name="init.gettext-dist" description="Loads the gettext-dist task">
  <taskdef name="gettext-dist" classname="org.xnap.commons.ant.gettext.GettextDistTask" classpath="${gettexttasks.jar}"/>
</target>
